Attempt.definition: the crime of having the intent to commit and taking action in an effort to commit a crime that fails or is prevented called also criminal attempt see also impossibility NOTE

1.1: the crime of having the intent to commit and taking action in an effort to commit a crime that fails or is prevented called also
1.note: There is no settled answer to how close to completing a crime a person must be to be guilty of attempt, but attempt must generally consist of more than preparation.
